text: Jack Welborn (December 20, 1932 â€“ March 7, 2021) was an American Republican politician. He was a member of the Michigan House of Representatives from 1973 to 1974 and in the Michigan Senate from 1975 to 1982 and from 1985 to 1994. He was born in Kalamazoo, Michigan. Welborn died of kidney failure on March 7, 2021, in Kalamazoo at age 88. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Michigan Category:People from Kalamazoo, Michigan Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Jack Welborn
